metadata.title: CVE-2022-0090 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered affecting GitLab versions prior to 14.4.5,between 14.5.0 and 14.5.3, and between 14.6.0 and 14.6.1. GitLab isconfigured in a way that it doesn't ignore replacement references with gitsub-commands, allowing a malicious user to spoof the contents of theircommits in the UI.

criterions.comment: gitlab package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
